com.mapbox.mapboxsdk.utils

Class MapFragmentUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mapbox.mapboxsdk.utils.MapFragmentUtils

  • public class MapFragmentUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    MapFragment utility class.

    Used to extract duplicate code between MapFragment and SupportMapFragment.
